mapper.insert: insert into tu_portfolio_article (id_portfolio, id_article, sort_no) values (#{idPortfolio}, #{idArticle}, #{maxSortNo})
mapper.update: update tu_portfolio_article set sort_no = #{sortNo} where id_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_article = #{idArticle}
mapper.delete: delete from tu_portfolio_article where id_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_article = #{idArticle}
mapper.select: select id, portfolio_head_img_url, portfolio_title, portfolio_author_id, portfolio_description, updated_time from tu_portfolio where portfolio_author_id = #{idUser}

select id, portfolio_head_img_url, portfolio_title, portfolio_author_id,
portfolio_description_html as portfolio_description,
portfolio_description,
updated_time from tu_portfolio where id = #{id}
select count(*) from tu_portfolio_article where id_portfolio = #{idPortfolio}
select count(*) from tu_portfolio_article where id_portfolio = #{idPortfolio} and id_article = #{idArticle}
select ifnull(max(sort_no),0) + 1 from tu_portfolio_article where id_portfolio = #{idPortfolio}

select fp.*,fpa.numbers from tu_portfolio fp left join (select id_portfolio, count(id_portfolio) numbers from tu_portfolio_article group by id_portfolio) fpa on fp.id = fpa.id_portfolio order by fpa.numbers desc, updated_time desc
